trans-unit.source: Use the <c>UidManager</c> element in your project file to create and execute this task.
trans-unit.target: Use o <c>UidManager</c> elemento no arquivo de projeto para criar e executar essa tarefa.

trans-unit.source: For usage and parameter information, see [UidManager](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4fc7b5a5-11b0-46ca-9656-8c2a0b08d1fe).
trans-unit.target: Para obter informações sobre uso e parâmetro, consulte [UidManager](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4fc7b5a5-11b0-46ca-9656-8c2a0b08d1fe).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Windows.UidManager" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Windows.UidManager" />.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the task executed successfully; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se a tarefa for executada com êxito; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the directory that is used to back up the source [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] files that are specified by the <see cref="P:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Windows.UidManager.MarkupFiles" /> property.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o diretório que é usado para fazer backup de origem [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] arquivos que são especificados pelo <see cref="P:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Windows.UidManager.MarkupFiles" /> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: The directory that is used to back up the source [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] files that are specified by the <see cref="P:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Windows.UidManager.MarkupFiles" /> property.
trans-unit.target: O diretório que é usado para fazer backup de origem [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] arquivos que são especificados pelo <see cref="P:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Windows.UidManager.MarkupFiles" /> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the source [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] files to include for UID checking, updating, or removing.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a origem [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] arquivos a serem incluídos para UID verificando, atualizar ou remover.

trans-unit.source: The source [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] files to include for UID checking, updating, or removing.
trans-unit.target: A fonte de [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] arquivos a serem incluídos para UID verificando, atualizar ou remover.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the UID management task that you want to perform.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a tarefa de gerenciamento de UID que você deseja executar.

trans-unit.source: The UID management task that you want to perform.
trans-unit.target: A tarefa de gerenciamento de UID que você deseja executar.
